text: Irangaam Records is a record label based in Enqelab Street , Tehran . It was founded in 1985 by an Iranian Sadroddin Hosseinkhani . The label focuses on Iranian music. Irangaam Records has been established by this slogan : Music For Everyone .Irangaam Records Official Website ==See also== * List of record labels ==References== Category:Record labels established in 1985 Category:Persian pop music Category:Persian music Category:Iranian record labels Category:1985 establishments in Iran
title: Irangaam
